duties_responsibilities.duty: Installs, maintains, configures, upgrades, and administers hardware and software independently in workstation support, server support, business continuity, information security support, telecommunications, and network connectivity support.

Conducts troubleshooting, learns new technologies, and provides outstanding customer service. Additionally needs knowledge of wide area network (WAN), local area network (LAN), and wireless connectivity.
Diagnoses, analyzes, and resolves issues for customers in assigned single technology domain. Provides Tier II-III level customer support.
Promotes system security and awareness by adhering to the Agency’s IT security policy(s) and standards. Stays current regarding new technologies, standards, and techniques.
Develops and maintains ad-hoc utilities or reports to automate processes. Supports users in the use of applications and software.

education_certification.credential: Completion of undergraduate core program in computer science or information systems; 12 months combined work experience in any combination of the following: installing, monitoring/maintaining, configuring, upgrading, &/or administering/operating a single technology domain including 12 months work experience in the primary technology specified by the agency in the position description & job posting.

Completion of associate core program in computer science or information systems; 18 months combined work experience in any combination of the following: installing, monitoring/maintaining, configuring, upgrading, &/or administering/operating a single technology domain including 12 months work experience in the primary technology specified by the agency in the position description & job posting.

36 months combined work experience in any combination of the following: installing, monitoring/maintaining, configuring, upgrading, &/or administering/operating a single technology domain including 12 months work experience in the primary technology specified by the agency in the position description & job posting.
